name: Civil Aviation Training Center (CATC)
about: The Civil Aviation Training Centre (CATC) is a premier institution dedicated to providing high-quality aviation training. Established to support the aviation industry, CATC offers competency-based training in air navigation services, including Air Traffic Control (ATC) and Communication, Navigation and Surveillance (CNS), adhering to global standards set by the International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO). As a full member of the ICAO TRAINAIR PLUS program and ISO 9001:2015 certified, CATC ensures its courses are internationally recognized. The centre's mission is to design, undertake, and manage training for technical and operational personnel in a cost-effective manner, aiming to become a leading aviation training institution in the region and beyond, dedicated to excellence, efficiency, teamwork, flexibility, and safety. CATC is committed to producing competent personnel to foster the development of the dynamic aviation industry.
